actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To prohibit the Department of the Treasury from issuing licenses to permit offshore dollar clearing outside of the United States financial system for transactions involving or benefitting Iran.

summary.text:
No Dollars for Iran Act

This bill prohibits the Department of the Treasury from issuing a license under any law, including the Iranian Transactions and Sanctions Regulations, which would permit a person to conduct offshore dollar clearing outside of the U.S. financial system for transactions that directly or indirectly would involve or benefit the government of Iran or any Iranian person.

titles.title: To prohibit the Department of the Treasury from issuing licenses to permit offshore dollar clearing outside of the United States financial system for transactions involving or benefitting Iran.
